name: frontened
description: - #### To use this package at max. ```bash npm init ``` - #### Download & install frontflow. ```bash npm i frontflow ``` - #### Make files like `.gitignore` & choose ES-6 syntax.`type` : `module`. Cut Readme file. - #### To run react server . Use command ```bash npm run react-dev ```
